response.original_title: The Fifteen Mysteries of the Rosary: The Joyful Mysteries
response.overview: This video was produced by Fr. Patrick Peyton, the famous “Family Rosary Crusade” priest. It is a full-scale drama of the Joyful mysteries of the Rosary. It is a beautiful and reverent drama that brings to life the story and meaning of each of the mysteries of the Rosary. The lavish production was filmed in Spain in 1957 with a cast of thousands.
response.title: The Fifteen Mysteries of the Rosary: The Joyful Mysteries

titles.title: The Life of Christ: Mysteries of the Rosary: The Joyful Mysteries
